item.title: Thirteen dead after naval speedboat hits ferry off Mumbai
item.description: Three navy personnel are among the dead, while more than 100 people have been rescued, an official said.

item.title: Tens of thousands without water in Mayotte as curfew brought in
item.description: Rescuers race to find missing people and survivors in the French territory devastated by Cyclone Chido.

item.title: Russia moving equipment at Syrian bases, satellite images show
item.description: Images show a build up of military vehicles at Russia's two bases in Syria near the Mediterranean Sea.

item.title: France's ex-President Sarkozy loses corruption case appeal
item.description: Nicolas Sarkozy - who now must wear an electronic tag - says he will challenge the ruling in Europe's court.

item.title: Mexico asks US to hand over 'mastermind' in journalist's killing
item.description: Mexican officials say cartel boss Damaso Lopez Serrano ordered the killing of well-known journalist Javier Valdez in 2017.
